content:
You may want to install from Fdroid as google play is depricated?

commonJS - Require. ESModules - Import

termux-setup-storage

pkg install x11-repo

pkg install root-repo

apt update && apt upgrade

nmap

termux -dialog <--- -camera-/info/photo <--- -tts-speak <--- -toast <--- -microphone-record <--- -location <--- -speech-to-text <--- -clipboard-set -keystore -job-scheduler -sms-/send/list/inbox -open -sensor -wake-lock /unlock -wifi-/connectioninfo/enable/scaninfo -volume -usb -telephony-/deviceinfo/cellinfo/call -media-scan -media-player -share -reset -restore -open-url -infrared-transmit -infrared-frequencies -info -fingerprint -download -call-log -brightness -battery-status -audio-info -api-stop -start -am -am-socket

termux-vibrate Vibrate the device. termux-volume Change volume of audio stream. termux-wallpaper Change wallpaper on your device. termux-tts-speak Speak text with a system text-to-speech engine. termux-toast Show a transient popup notification. termux-sensor Get information about types of sensors as well as live data. termux-microphone-record Recording using microphone on your device. termux-notification Display a system notification. termux-job-scheduler Schedule a Termux script to run later, or periodically. termux-location Get the device location. termux-dialog Show a text entry dialog. termux-camera-photo Take a photo and save it to a file in JPEG format.

https://store.nethunter.com/
